title: Which font is used here?
content:
Which font is used here? I would really appreciate if you can help :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Capture.PNG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824085010/http:/typophile.com/files/Capture_7.PNG) | 16.41 KB |
author: Fififa

comments.content: Where can I find this font? I googled it, but could not find anywhere.

Can't recognize this one (and don't know Travian either). As alternative, [Jupiter Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824085010/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/jupiter-pro) using some stylistic alternates (/ [N](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824085010/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/jupiter-pro/pro/glyphs.html#glyphs/434144/153), [V](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824085010/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/jupiter-pro/pro/glyphs.html#glyphs/434144/280) and / [R](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824085010/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/jupiter-pro/pro/glyphs.html#glyphs/434144/207)) would do the job quite nicely.
